duties_responsibilities.duty: Conduct financial analysis, develop forecasts, and prepare financial reports for the music/entertainment industry.
Utilize strategic planning to guide financial decision-making and support the business objectives of the entertainment industry.
Utilize accounting and financial applications software to streamline financial processes within the music/entertainment sector.
Develop and maintain complex financial models using Excel and other software tools to support financial planning and analysis.
Implement and manage Hyperion Financial Management/Smartview Reporting, SAP, and BPC planning systems to optimize financial performance in the music/entertainment industry.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Accounting, Finance, or a related field (CPA preferred)
